00044 {
00045     // Page independent
00046     XPI_R_INT_REQUEST          = 0, // D5..0: CTXE, PCM, EIRQ, CRX, CTX, FC
00047     // Page 0
00048     XPI_R_P0_SC_CTX            = 1, // D7..0= CTX data
00049     XPI_R_P0_SC_CRX            = 2, // D7..0= CRX data
00050     XPI_R_P0_SC_EIRQ           = 3, // D0= EIRQ
00051     XPI_R_P0_FC_FDFA           = 4, // D5= FCA5 .. D2= FCA0, D1= FCD1, D0= FCD0
00052     XPI_R_P0_FC_SENSE          = 5, // D0= SENSE
00053     XPI_R_P0_FC_STATUS         = 6, // D3= SENSE, D2= FCE, D1= FCD, D0= FCC
00054     XPI_R_P0_GLB_STATUS        = 7, // D1= EIRQ, D0= MCPU
00055     // Page 1
00056     XPI_R_P1_IRQ_ENABLE        = 1, // D5..0= CTXE, PCM, EIRQ, CRX, CTX, FC
00057     XPI_R_P1_MAGIC_LSB         = 4, // D7..0= '10101010' (0xAA)
00058     XPI_R_P1_MAGIC_MSB         = 5, // D7..0= '00010001' (0x11)
00059     XPI_R_P1_BOARD_POS         = 7, // D5..0= KA5..0
00060     // Page 2
00061     XPI_R_P2_PCM_ACK           = 0, // Dummy read (data should be ignored)
00062     XPI_R_P2_PCM_R0            = 4, // D7..0= PCM data
00063     XPI_R_P2_PCM_R1            = 5, // D7..0= PCM data
00064     XPI_R_P2_PCM_T0            = 6, // D7..0= PCM data
00065     XPI_R_P2_PCM_T1            = 7  // D7..0= PCM data
00066     };

00092 {
00093     XPI_IRQ_CTXE        = 0x20, // CTX empty
00094     XPI_IRQ_PCM         = 0x10, // PCM frame sync
00095     XPI_IRQ_EIRQ        = 0x08, // EIRQ changed event
00096     XPI_IRQ_CRX         = 0x04, // CRX data received event
00097     XPI_IRQ_CTX         = 0x02, // CTX data received event
00098     XPI_IRQ_FC          = 0x01, // FC data received event
00099     XPI_LED_R           = 0x04, // Red LED

00101     XPI_LED_G           = 0x01, // Green LED
00102     XPI_FC_SENSE        = 0x08, // SENSE bit
00103     XPI_FC_FCE          = 0x04, // FCE bit
